content.body: Stumbled across the lack of https://github.com/tc39/proposal-regex-escaping today. Doing any kind of case-insensitive substring search without it seems hard? But reading through it, it also doesn't seem as straightforward as one would hope.

annevk: yeah we had a conversation about it a meeting or two ago - I think just escaping literally every ASCII punctuator, and possibly also whitespace (against a future `x` mode), would be sufficient to address everyone's concerns; we might do that
